info.title: SuperOffice Agent API v1
info.termsOfService: You must be an authorized user to access this API.

post.summary: Get caller ids that the current principal might be interested in (phone numbers of related persons in sales and appointments created/owned/touched by ourselves or colleagues in our primary group

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: LastHash, MinDate, MaxDate

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Get caller ids from a selection.
post.description:
Queries the shadow selection of persons and companies, so selections of any kind can be used
NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.PocketCar.description: GetMyCallerIDs: Get caller ids that the current principal might be interested in (phone numbers of related persons in sales and appointments created/owned/touched by ourselves or colleagues in our primary group

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CallerIDCollect.description:
Collection of caller ids with their corresponding hash
<para />
Carrier object for CallerIDCollection.
Services for the CallerIDCollection Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPocketAgent">Pocket Agent</see>.

CallerIDHash.description: Hash of the caller ids, used for checking if the same set of caller ids was sent earlier

CallerIDs.description: Array of caller ids, sorted numerically on the phone number

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CallerID.description:
Describes a caller ID for Mobile to lookup phone calls. Can be for a person, or for a company, in which case the personId field will be 0
<para />
Carrier object for CallerID.
Services for the CallerID Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPocketAgent">Pocket Agent</see>.

PhoneNumber.description: Phone number, as a long instead of a string, to avoid parsing all the phonenumbers in Mobile CRM

DialInPrefix.description: Prefix for dialing into the country from outside (country code), empty if PhoneNumber already contains the country code

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.PocketCar.description: GetCallerIDsFromSelection: Get caller ids from a selection. Queries the shadow selection of persons and companies, so selections of any kind can be used

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PocketStartupDa.description:
The Pocket Service. The service implements pocket specific stuff, like consolidated post-login stuff.
<para />
Carrier object for PocketStartupData.
Services for the PocketStartupData Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPocketAgent">Pocket Agent</see>.

TableRights.description: List of tablerights for logged in user, in the same order as the Tables array parameter

OverdueSalesCount.description: Number of overdued sales for current user

SystemWebPanels.description: Web panels defined in Admin client, set to be shown in Pocket client

PocketPreferences.description: All Pocket specific preferences, including WebPanels defined by the user in Pocket

IsPushNotificationEnabled.description: Is push notification configured and enabled in Netserver

CustomData.description: Custom data for Pocket, in JSON format

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

Name.description: Name associated with the location: Country name + region name, Norway, United States - Alaska

TZLocationCode.description:
Code associated with location: UTC, AR-NQ, AU-QLD, PF2A
Not the an ISO country code. Unique.

TZLocationCities.description: Cities associated with location: Oslo, London, Rio de Janeiro

IsoNumber.description: Country ISO code associated with location: 578

TimeZoneDSTRules.description: Dictionary of Daylight saving time rules

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.WebPanelEntity.description:
The web panel entity contains information on a web panel
<para />
Carrier object for WebPanelEntity.
Services for the WebPanelEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

WebPanelId.description: The identity of the web panel

Name.description: The name of the web panel

Tooltip.description: The tooltip of the web panel

Deleted.description: True if the web panel is marked as deleted

Rank.description: The rank of the web panel

OnCentral.description: Is the webpanel visible when user is on central database

OnSatellite.description: Is the webpanel visible when user is on a satellite

OnTravel.description: Is the webpanel visible when user is on travel

OnSalesMarketingWeb.description: Is the webpanel visible when user is on web client

OnSalesMarketingPocket.description: Is the webpanel visible when user is on pocket client

ShowInMenuBar.description: Does the webpanel have a menu bar

ShowInToolBar.description: Does the webpanel have a toolbar

ShowInAddressBar.description: Does the webpanel have an address bar

ShowInStatusBar.description: Does the webpanel have a status bar

WindowName.description: The window which the URL address is to open in (webpanel only)

ProgId.description: String key that can be used to uniquely retrieve the panel; particularly useful for partners and others who do not wish to store database ID's

AlwaysReloadOnShow.description: If set to true, the content will reload every time the panel is shown

NeverReloadOnCurrentChange.description: If set to true, the content will not reload on current changes, only applies to sidepanels

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.TableRight.description:
Wraps a table right together with an explanatory reason.
Code can indicate why access is restricted.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldProperty.description: Class holding properties like field length, field type about a field in the carrier.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldRight.description:
Wraps the field right together with an explanatory reason.
Also adds logical operators to the field rights so that they can be easily combined.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Preference.description:
One preference item, which contains a specification (section/key), the raw string value, and the level at which this value was found.
<para />
Carrier object for Preference.
Services for the Preference Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPreferenceAgent">Preference Agent</see>.

Level.description: Preference level, using the standard enumerated type. Undefined is returned for preferences that do not have a current setting.

Specification.description: Preference specification, consisting of the section name and key name

DisplayValue.description: Display value, populated when asked for. Suitable for binding display-datasource in lists, etc. Formatted using CultureDataFormatter.

DisplayTooltip.description: Display tooltip, populated when asked for. Suitable for binding display-datasource in lists, etc. Formatted using CultureDataFormatter.

DisplayType.description: Display type, populated when asked for.

TargetId.description: The id of the target row. The table it points at is specified by the preference type.

PrefDescId.description: The id of the prefdesc this preference is connected to

TableName.description: For DisplayType=PrefDescValueType.ListTableRef, TableName will contain the name of the table which the value reference to.

UserPreferenceId.description: The id of the user preference

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PreferenceSpec.description:
Preference specification, consisting of the section name and key name
<para />
Carrier object for PreferenceSpec.
Services for the PreferenceSpec Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPreferenceAgent">Preference Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TabOrder.description:
Carrier object for TabOrder.
Services for the TabOrder Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPreferenceAgent">Preference Agent</see>.

AssociateId.description: Associate who owns this tab order

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.PocketCar.description: RegisterDeviceForPushNotification: Register a device that should receive push notifications when notable events occour

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PocketDeviceInf.description:
Describes a device running Pocket CRM
<para />
Carrier object for PocketDeviceInfo.
Services for the PocketDeviceInfo Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPocketAgent">Pocket Agent</see>.

DeviceName.description: A friendly display name for the device. Ex: 'Bobbys iPhone 5S'

DeviceIdentifier.description: A unique identifier of this device. This value should always be the same for the same device

PocketVersion.description: What version of Pocket CRM this device is running. Ex: '8.0.37'

Language.description: The language which this device will receive notifications translated in

PNSHandle.description: The identifier associated with the device that will be used when talking with vendors push services

Platform.description: What platform does this device belong to

OSVersion.description: The operating system version. Ex: 'iOS v10.2'

TimeZoneId.description: The timezone to show for dates in messages

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.PocketCar.description: GetRegisteredDevices: Retrieve all registered devices for an associate
SetPushNotificationTagsForDevice: Specify what kind of notification events a device should receive push notifications for
SetPushNotificationTagsForUser: Specify what kind of notification events a user should receive push notifications for.  This will update all registerred devices for this user.
GetPushNotificationTagsForDevice: Retrieve current tag value for a device
SendPushNotification: Send a push notification to one or more associates

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PocketNotificat.description:
Describes behaviour and content for a push notification message
<para />
Carrier object for PocketNotificationMessage.
Services for the PocketNotificationMessage Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPocketAgent">Pocket Agent</see>.

Url.description: An url associated with the notification that will be handled by Pocket

Silent.description: Indicates wether or not the message will vibrate/play a sound when delivered

Type.description: The type of notification this is

TimeToLive.description: Specifies how many minutes the message should be valid

RecordId.description: If the message is about some specific database record, this could be its primary key

Date.description: If the message is about some event happening at a specific date and time

ExtraValues.description: Additional key/value properties to include in the message

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.PocketCar.description: NotifyUsers: Notify users about a new or changed entity
NotificationHandled: Mark a notification as handled, so it can be cleaned up on other clients that have received the notification
NotificationsHandled: Mark a set of notifications as handled, so they can be cleaned up on other clients that have received the notification

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.NotificationEve.description:
Carrier for a notification event for a given notification type and entity id
<para />
Carrier object for NotificationEvent.
Services for the NotificationEvent Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPocketAgent">Pocket Agent</see>.

Id.description: Id of entity this notification event is about

SuperOffice Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.

externalDocs.description: The SuperOffice DevNet Community has more documentation, examples, and discussion forums.
